medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea, vomiting, and severe back pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports feeling poorly for the past several weeks after receiving a flu shot. Occasional nausea after eating was noted. Severe back pain developed suddenly yesterday afternoon, radiating around her waist in a band-like distribution, associated with worsening nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, enterocele/cystocele, spinal stenosis, chronic heartburn.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had rheumatic heart disease. Father had myocardial infarction.
